net.hudup.core.data

Class UserPaddingMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.PaddingMatrix
      • net.hudup.core.data.UserPaddingMatrix
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class UserPaddingMatrix
extends PaddingMatrix
    This class represents a matrix where the first row is list of item id (s). The first column is list of user id (s)
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
